## createBaseGameConfig() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Generate a game config using the base game tile counts, optionally including any of the three expansion tiles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createBaseGameConfig(options: {
    ladybug: boolean;
    mosquito: boolean;
    pillbug: boolean;
}): GameConfig;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

{ ladybug: boolean; mosquito: boolean; pillbug: boolean; }


</td><td>

An object indicating which expansion tiles to include.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[GameConfig](./hive-lib.gameconfig.md)

A game object.
